title: Loosies (2012) 1080p iTunes
description:
Loosies (2012) 88 min

DESCRIPTION:
A New York City pickpocket, living a fast, free, lifestyle, is confronted by a woman he impregnated on a one night stand.

SPECS IN BRIEF:
M4V file for iTunes/iDevices
V: 1920x1040 23.98 fps h.264 @ ~3838 Kbps
A: 160 Kbps 2.0 AAC & 384 Kbps 5.1 AC-3
S: English & English SDH

Loosies.2012.1080p.BluRay.x264-SHUNPO

PLAYBACK:
Encoded & tagged for iTunes and Apple devices that can handle *1080p HD* video. Playback is confirmed for:
  1. 2012 iPad
  2. 2012 AppleTV
  3. 2011 iPad 2 (with 5.0 software or later)
  4. 2011 iPhone 4S
  5. 2010 AppleTV (with 5.0 software; will output file as 720p)
  6. 2010 iPad 1 (with 5.0 software or later) <-- Mixed reports
